short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tag, label and comment on blockchain addresses and transactions across multiple networks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tagging Ethereum Addresses and Blockchain Assets Graphically

Introducing 0xTeabag – your one-stop solution for organizing and managing all your blockchain interactions across prominent explorers like Etherscan, Arbiscan, BscScan, PolygonScan, Optimistic Etherscan and Gunzscan! 🚀

With 0xTeabag, you can effortlessly label and comment on addresses and transactions, giving you a clear picture of your activities at a glance. No more struggling with random strings of characters - just simple, recognizable labels that keep you one step ahead of scams.

Enjoy seamless persistence across all blockchain explorers, ensuring that you always know what's happening with your addresses and transactions. Stay in control and never lose track again! 🎯

But that's not all! 0xTeabag’s robust team and permissions model lets you tailor access to your stored data, giving you complete control over who can view or edit. Collaboration has never been this secure and easy! 🔐

Want more? 0xTeabag offers optional integration with Tres.finance, allowing you to automatically track your Web3 finances while you navigate the extension. Monitor and manage your crypto world with convenience and confidence.

Experience the future of blockchain management with 0xTeabag today! 🌐✨
